title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.5 - Duties of the advisory committees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.5 - Duties of the advisory committees

State Regulations

Subject to the supervision of the

Appellate Division, the attorneys for children advisory committees shall
establish procedures for appointment and reappointment of attorneys to serve on
the attorneys for children panels, for periodic evaluation of attorneys who
serve on the attorneys for children panels, for training of attorneys on the
attorneys for children panels, for investigating complaints made against
members of the attorneys for children panels, and for removal of attorneys from
the attorneys for children panels. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
679.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
